name: js-exercises
description: Hand-in for International Web Dev Cphbusiness

scripts.all: npm i && npm run day-1 && npm run day-3 && npm run day-4 && npm run pages
scripts.day-1: npm run function-objects && npm run classes && npm run arrays && npm run arrays-objects
scripts.day-2: echo 'Visit https://roman-octavian.github.io/I-wed-en-0924a-Sem1-js-ex/ for the day-2 pages' && live-server ./day-2 --port=8081
scripts.day-3: npm run loops-arrays && npm run conditionals && npm run higher-lower
scripts.day-3-pages: echo 'Visit https://roman-octavian.github.io/I-wed-en-0924a-Sem1-js-ex/ for the day-3 pages' && live-server ./day-3/pages --port=8082

author: Octavian Roman
